# Limited-Time Offer for Former Subscribers

**From:** The New Yorker <newyorker@newsletter.newyorker.com>
**Date:** Tue, 13 Jan 2026 10:01:30 -0500 (EST)
**Source:** [View original](https://link.condenast.com/view/5bea16dd3f92a40469736b16pwo0k.769/7a33846e)

Resubscribe and save 50%

Exclusive offer for former subscribers: Return today and save 50%

The New Yorker is celebrating a milestone birthday this year&mdash;our hundredth&mdash;and we hope you’ll join us. As the magazine marks its first century, we remain dedicated to delivering the rigor of reporting, depth of thought, and quality of prose that you expect from us. We’ve also prepared a year of special articles, issues, and events to honor the occasion.

[Re-subscribe today and save 50%](https://link.newyorker.com/click/43514516.) with our exclusive offer, only for former subscribers.

Here are just a few of the benefits you’ll receive:

Every Story, Every Issue
Get vital journalism, the New Yorker app, and more.

Audio & Video
Explore podcasts, narrated articles, and original films.

Puzzles & Games
Tease your brain every weekday with crosswords and more.

Cartoons
Sharpen your wit with timeless, clever humor, delivered daily.

The next one hundred years begins with you.

Cancel or pause anytime.

[View this email in your browser](https://link.condenast.com/view/5bea16dd3f92a40469736b16pwo0k.769/7a33846e)

You received this email because you are a former subscriber to The New Yorker.

View our [Privacy Policy](https://link.condenast.com/click/43514516.)
